title: Eiffel Tower height
content: <fact id="sub_private_01" trust="0.95" title="Eiffel Tower height">The Eiffel Tower is 330 metres tall.</fact>

title: Eiffel Tower material
content: <fact id="sub_private_02" trust="0.9" title="Eiffel Tower material">The Eiffel Tower is made of puddled iron.</fact>
